message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I've done some research and I believe that's a fair price for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider $11,500, which reflects my willingness to negotiate.
I understand that you think the product is worth more, but I'm still interested in getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,500. Can you consider this price?
